column1: 63257623$Sylvan Peaskeeper$Unlimited$WIND$[Plant/Effect]$$$$$1$400$100$$$$When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can excavate the top card of your Deck
column2: and if it is a Plant-Type monster
column3: send it to the Graveyard. Otherwise
column4: place it on the bottom of your Deck. If this card is excavated from the Deck and sent to the Graveyard by a card effect: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Plant-Type monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target. You can only use this effect of "Sylvan Peaskeeper" once per turn.$Plant$$Activates upon Normal Summon/Activates upon Special Summon/Excavates from the player's Deck/Sends excavated cards to the Graveyard/Sends from your Deck to your Graveyard/Changes your Deck order/Places excavated cards on the bottom of the Deck/Places cards from the Deck on the bottom of the Deck/Activates from your Graveyard$Trigger/Condition$

column1: 10753491$Sylvan Cherubsprout$Unlimited$LIGHT$[Plant/Effect]$$$$$1$100$100$$$$When this card is Special Summoned: You can choose either 1 or 2
column2: then excavate that many cards from the top of your Deck
column3: send any excavated Plant-Type monsters to the Graveyard
column4: also place the other cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order. If this card is excavated from the Deck and sent to the Graveyard by a card effect: You can Special Summon 1 Level 1 Plant-Type monster from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Sylvan Cherubsprout" once per turn.$Plant$$Activates upon Special Summon/Excavates from the player's Deck/Sends excavated cards to the Graveyard/Sends from your Deck to your Graveyard/Places excavated cards on the bottom of the Deck/Places cards from the player's Deck on the bottom of the Deck/Changes the player's Deck order/Activates from your Graveyard$Trigger/Condition$

column1: 55599882$Bujintervention$Unlimited$SPELL$$$$$$$$$$$$Target 1 "Bujin" monster on the field; apply this effect to it for the rest of this turn. Each time it destroys a monster by battle whose current ATK is greater than or equal to the targeted monster's original ATK
column2: and sends it to the Graveyard: Banish the destroyed monster
column4: banish all monsters from your opponent's hand
column7: and Graveyard with the same name that the destroyed monster had in the Graveyard.$Supports archetypes /Bujin$$Activates when it destroys a monster by battle$Effect/Trigger-like$
